sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import Navbar from './components/Navbar'; import ScrollToTop from './components/ScrollToTop'; import './admissions.css'; const Admissions = () => { const [isTopBarVisible, setIsTopBarVisible] = useState(true); const [lastScrollY, setLastScrollY] = useState(0); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', phone: '', program: '', message: '' }); const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false); const [submitStatus, setSubmitStatus] = useState(''); // Scroll-based navbar visibility useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { const currentScrollY = window.scrollY; if (currentScrollY > lastScrollY && currentScrollY > 100) { setIsTopBarVisible(false); } else if (currentScrollY < lastScrollY && currentScrollY < 50) { setIsTopBarVisible(true); } setLastScrollY(currentScrollY); }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll, { passive: true }); return () => { window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }; }, [lastScrollY]); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsSubmitting(true); setSubmitStatus(''); // Simulate form submission setTimeout(() => { setIsSubmitting(false); setSubmitStatus('success'); setFormData({ firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', phone: '', program: '', message: '' }); // Reset status after 3 seconds setTimeout(() => setSubmitStatus(''), 3000); }, 1500); }; return (
{/* Admissions Hero Section */}

Admissions Admissions

Begin your journey to academic excellence at City College of Bayawan

Your future starts here with quality education and endless opportunities

{/* Admissions Section */}
{/* Requirements Section */}

Admission Requirements

High School Diploma

Original copy of high school diploma or certificate of completion

Academic Records

Official transcript of records from previous school

Personal Information

Birth certificate, valid ID, and recent 2x2 photos

Medical Certificate

Health certificate from a licensed physician

{/* Application Process Section */}

Application Process

1

Submit Requirements

Complete the application form and submit all required documents to the Admissions Office

2

Document Review

Our admissions team will review your application and verify all submitted documents

3

Interview

Schedule and attend a personal interview with our academic advisors

4

Acceptance

Receive your acceptance letter and enrollment instructions

{/* Important Dates Section */}

Important Dates

Application Period

January 15 - March 31, 2025

Document Submission

February 1 - April 15, 2025

Interviews

March 1 - April 30, 2025

Enrollment

May 1 - June 30, 2025

{/* Application Form Section */}

Request Information

{submitStatus === 'success' && (
Thank you! Your information request has been submitted successfully.
)}
{/* Footer */}

City College of Bayawan

Honor and Excellence for the Highest Good

Honus et Excellentia Ad Summum Bonum

Contact Information

üìç Bayawan City, Negros Oriental

üìû (035) XXX-XXXX

‚úâÔ∏è info@ccb.edu.ph

Quick Links

Home Academic Programs Admissions News & Events

© 2025 City College of Bayawan. All rights reserved.

{/* Scroll to Top Button */}
); }; export default Admissions;
